DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate if changes to the built environment influence physical activity and active transport to school in children and youth.
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Study to Assess the Role of the Built Environment on Physical Activity and Active Transportation to School in Children and Youth
DOC.criteria: Student is in grade 4 10 at start of study (fall 2012), or grade 4 at any of the subsequent study years (20132015). Student's parent(s) or guardian(s) provide(s) consent. Student is not in grade 4 10 at start of study (fall 2012). Student's parent(s) or guardian(s) do(es) not provide consent. Student cannot read or write in English.
